item.title: President’s Open Letter on behalf of the CGCU
item.author: Lejon Chua,
item.description: My dear engineering friends, When they first announced the new CGCU President earlier in March this year, I clearly remembered how Lotanna Agu single-handedly hoisted me into the air. Above the crowd cheering for me, I shouted one of my most memorable campaign slogans out loud “You can count on me!” …

item.title: Keeping up with the Engineers
item.author: Lejon Chua,Carol Ann Cheah,
item.description: Integrating Engineers: the way to reviving the CGCU brand Geeky punnery aside, the City and Guilds College Union (better known as the CGCU) has bounced back this year - having spent a good while in relative “CGC-who?” obscurity. With a fresh-faced committee in place working towards a unified theme - …
